subject: Re: substring of a string delimited by "/"
body:
Nishi wrote:
> 
> I have a string of the format -
> 
> abc/def/ghi
> or
> abc\def\ghi
> 
> I want to strip of abc and return just
> def/ghi
> or
> def\ghi
> 
> How do I do that?

use strict;
use warnings;

foreach (qw( abc/def/ghi abc\def\ghi )) {
  (my $trim = $_) =~ s|.*?[/\\]||;
  print "$_  ->  $trim\n";
}

**OUTPUT**

abc/def/ghi  ->  def/ghi
abc\def\ghi  ->  def\ghi


HTH,

Rob
